summary: The implementation successfully addresses all four requirements. The backend adds a per-investor session buffer storing exactly 6 transaction hashes with FIFO behavior, implements a read-only endpoint returning ordered hashes, and the code is visible in backend/main.mo. The frontend integrates the new endpoint with a dashboard display showing session hashes.

hallucinated_features.description: Frontend UI component displaying session transaction hashes in Dashboard.tsx
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly lists 'Adding frontend UI for displaying the buffer' in Non-goals, indicating frontend visualization was not requested
